docs.title: Overview
docs.text: Flagship is a full-stack feature flag management platform.

docs.title: Admin server
docs.text:
Python / FastAPI

  • API server used by the Flagship UI
  • Deals with:
    • Authentication
    • Managing projects
    • Managing context fields
    • Managing feature flags
    • Mangaging users
    • Retrieving audit logs

docs.title: Flags server
docs.text:
Python / FastAPI

  • Handles determining which feature flags are enabled for a given context

docs.title: SDKs
docs.text:
• Libraries for interacting with the Flags server
  • SDKs are available in various programming languages

docs.title: Databases
docs.text: The Admin and Flags servers require MySQL and Redis Cluster.
